backend/main.mo: Motoko canister exposing validateCustomDomain, enforcing domain length, allowed characters, and no trailing hyphen with traps on invalid values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components for the laundry price calculator and input validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing various frontend source files, styles, config, and the laundry price calculator component.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app entry script into a root div.
frontend/README.md: Project README describing app features, setup steps, and development instructions for the STAYM Laundry frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component integrating the laundry price calculator and custom domain validation UI.
frontend/src/components/LaundryPriceCalc: Component providing quantity inputs for five laundry items with validation and total price calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomDomainValida: React hook implementing local and backend-driven custom domain validation with clear error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, and plugins using CSS variables for theming.
project_state.json: Stores metadata describing the project's structure, features, build state, and generated assets.
